display_long_description:
Become Santa Claus: Transform into the legendary gift-giver in this enchanting VR experience on Meta Quest. Feel the magic as you take on Santa's role during Christmas Eve.

Deliver Joy to every one: Your mission is to toss presents into chimneys, ensuring every one wakes up to the excitement of Christmas morning. Precision and timing are key to spreading holiday cheer!

Ride the Sleigh: Glide through snowy landscapes atop Santa’s sleigh, pulled by faithful reindeer. Soar across rooftops, navigating through festive winter scenes that bring the holiday spirit to life.

Overcome Challenges: Watch out for obstacles like blizzards and cheeky snowbirds that can disrupt your deliveries. Stay focused to ensure no child is left without a gift!

Earn Points and Rewards: Every successful gift delivery earns you points. Aim for high scores as you master the art of Santa’s gift toss and unlock festive surprises along the way.

Festive Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a world of dazzling visuals, cheerful holiday music, and intuitive VR controls, making this a magical.

Perfect for Family Fun: Whether playing solo or sharing the joy with friends and family, Santa's Gift Toss is the ultimate holiday VR game to celebrate the Christmas spirit.
